projects.title: RIT Electric Vehicle Team - Embedded Software
projects.description: Firmware for microcontroller systems and software for Linux systems.
projects.text:
● Designed the software architecture for co-dependent applications in an embedded Linux environment written in C++ and Python.
● Developed low-level device drivers for PIC and ARM microcontrollers in C and C++.
● Wrote a build script for parsing industry standard CAN database files to generate datapacking source code in C.

projects.title: Senior Design Project - Autonomous Search and Rescue
projects.description: Simulation of natural disaster and using computer vision to identify survivors to evacuate quickly and safely.
projects.text: Simulation of a forest fire scenario whereby a Raspberry Pi with a camera scanned the map and evaluated a number of paths to the survivor depending on parameters. Paths were serialized into robot commands and used to guide a robot to the survivor.
projects.uses: Raspberry Pi, ZigBee, Python, OpenCV, PySerial, Teensy 3.2, C++
